content: who doesn t love pickles this large pickle friend stands 2 tall and is perfect for cuddling slip stitches help to give it its curved shape and large safety eyes and pink cheeks give it that perfect kawaii face you ll be smiling as you make this fun new toy experiment with the number of row to create a short fat kirby cucumber or long and lean persian cucumber materials 130 yards of blanket yarn 6 weight 9 0 mm hook 18mm safety eyes scrap white pink black yarn stuffing stitches single_crochet = single_crochet mc = magic_ring increase = increase decrease = decrease sl = slipstitch beginner friendly
